title: 2 bd 2 ba Sunny Beautiful Apartment Available 9/1
posting_body: Just a stone's Throw to East Boston and on the other side of the bridge in the desirable Chelsea waterfront neighborhood.
This is this bright and airy home.
Close to Mary O'Malley waterfront park/ Admiral's Hill.
This oversized home unit features 2 beds and 2 full baths, a large living room, a formal dining room, open concept kitchen and a four season enclosed sunroom/office.
The home contains some Brazilian cherry hardwood floors, 12' ceilings and a working wood fireplace complete with 1 deeded parking and a shared guest parking spot as well as central AC.
Chelsea residents enjoy a Tobin Bridge discount to $ 0.32.
Water is included and we require to get rental insurance.
